channel.title: Visualization on Ramesh Sundaram
channel.description: Recent content in Visualization on Ramesh Sundaram

item.title: The making of the Petty Breakdown, our winning viz in the Tableau contest
item.description: A few weeks (er, maybe months) ago, Atlanta Tableau User Group (ATUG) announced a visualization contest. We, a core team of 3 from Moxie (Zack, John and myself) entered and we won. We also won tickets on the 15th row for the Tom Petty concert in Atlanta, and just a little bit of extra data viz street cred. Proud! And very thrilled!! But more importantly, we learned a few things along the way.
